text: Billy the Kid and the Green Baize Vampire is a 1985 British fantasy musical horror comedy movie directed by Alan Clarke and starring Phil Daniels, Bruce Payne, Alun Armstrong, Don Henderson, Louise Gold, Kevin Lloyd, Caroline Quentin. ==Other websites== * Category:1985 musical movies Category:1985 fantasy movies Category:1985 horror movies Category:1985 comedy movies Category:British musical movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:British horror movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies about vampires Category:Movies directed by Alan Clarke
title: Billy the Kid and the Green Baize Vampire
